channel.title: How do i put in codes?
channel.description:
Like i saw some update things for like trimming skill ect, any chance someone could tell me how to get to the place where you paste that in?
Another question, how do i get a gold crown near my name? o.o
Thanks :P

item.title: How do i put in codes?
item.dc:creator: @n0vamage n0vamage
item.description:
@n0vamage wrote:

to get a gold crown by ur name u enter ur character file find ur account name open up ur account notepad and u should see this

[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3251 character-posy = 3433 character-rights = 3 character-ismember = 1 character-messages = 0 character-lastconnection = localhost character-lastlogin = 20061117 character-energy = 100 character-gametime = 0 character-gamecount = 6764
where it says character-rites = 0 u wanna change that zero to a 1 for mod 2 for admin and 3 for owner i hope this helps you with that

and for the other thing to paste in codes u want to open up your client.java and ctrl-f type in what they told you to search and basically just follow the steps they typed to help you with it all

hope this helped u with your problems.

n0va

Read full topic
item.source: How do i put in codes?

item.title: How do i put in codes?

@Informer wrote:

To make yourself and admin on your server you have to edit and recode your character file.Dont ask me I dont know that much about testscape.
